item.title: AaDBR2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaDBR2 Gene Name: double-bond reductase 2 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: We found that a trichome-specific transcription factor, AaWRKY9, positively regulates artemisinin biosynthesis by directly binding to the promoters of the artemisinin biosynthesis genes AaDBR2 and AaGSW1.
